rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: This class is a self branding project all semester.  You have to blog two times per week so there is a lot of work to do. But Prof Gary helps you prepare for the job search by helping you master Linkedin, create a better resume and make a brand of yourself.
Great class. Fun.

Gary is an awesome professor! Most importantly, his class projects, whether on New Media and technologies or  Branding of Me, actually make an impact on the students life as well as the community around us.
Good teacher. You should try to go on his trade show internships too!
Prof Kayye is honest and blunt. I wish more professors were.  It is easy to follow his lectures and he seems to really care that we are learning.
Gary is inspirational and actually cares about his students. He is the best professor I had in 4 years at UNC. The best.
The IndianaJones of UNC. Too bad he's taken.
Made the classroom discussions engaging and entertaining. I never wanted to miss a class.
He's great. Extremely accessible and kind. I wish all my professors at UNC were as good as Prof Kayye
Very good professor - passion about the subject. Also, fun to look at - cute!
Awesome professor. Best I had at Carolina
